loginUrl:
<js>
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
</js>

function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%"+url+"%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22<,{{(page-1)*25}}>%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="bq"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}\}':u;
 u=tag=="lx"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=221&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{cookie.getKey("https://m.jjwxc.net","sid")}}':u
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){

obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}

	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))

ruleContent.content:
if(baseUrl.match(/jjwxc/)){ var javaImport = new JavaImporter(); javaImport.importPackage( Packages.java.lang, Packages.javax.crypto.spec, Packages.javax.crypto, Packages.java.util ); with(javaImport){ let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b"); let ALGORITHM = "DES"; let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding"; let CHARSET = "utf-8"; let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN"); function decode(data){ let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes()); let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES"); let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks); let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM); let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET)); cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv); return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET); } } //DES解密结束 intro=java.get("intro"); intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getElement("$.content"); saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n作者有话说：\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ result=intro+String(decode(content)+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} flag_comment=source.getVariable() //获取评论开启 if(!baseUrl.match(/baidu/)){ if(flag_comment==1){ //匹配书籍id跟章节id bid=baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1]; cid=baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1]; //拼接评论url url="https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+bid+"&chapterid="+cid; //获取评论列表 list=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).body; comment=""; //判断评论数量 len=list.length>15?15:list.length; for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+

<js>
$=result;
title=$.chaptername;
title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');
intro=$.chapterintro;
java.put("intro",intro);
vip=$.isvip!='0';
lock=$.islock!='0';
type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;
num=!type?$.chapterid+"  ☪ ":'';
/*if(title.match(/[一二三四五六七八九十百千万\d]+\s*章|^\d+[、\.\s]|chapter\s*\d+/i)){
num=''
}else{num=num}*/
title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
v=vip?' ◇':'';l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l+v;
</js>

function sign(list){
    var sb='p33d3d7giyv8hlsd';
    list=list.sort();
    for(var i=0;i<list.length;i++){if(i==0){sb+=list[i];}else{sb+="&";sb+=list[i];}}
    sb+="ac9de0edzhozh5fwcqi3bn0w5cqvht0u";
    return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase();
}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))
</js>result

list=[];

page=6
}else{page=page}

}
list
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js> 
var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
var o = selector => String(J.select(selector).text()) ;
var og = selector => String(J.select('[property="og:' + selector + '"]').attr('content'));
var book = {
	name: og('novel:book_name').replace(/(全文|小说|免费阅读|最新章节).*|[(（].*[）)]/g, ''),
	author: og('novel:author'),
	kind: og('novel:category') + ',' + og('novel:status').replace(/中|已/, ''),
   wordCount: o('.blue:eq(1)').replace('字',''),
	latest: og('novel:latest_chapter_name').replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|章节目录|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(（【].*[求更谢乐发推].*/g, '') + ' • ' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-'),
	intro: '　　最近更新:' + og('novel:update_time').replace(/(T|\s).*/, ' ').replace(/\//g, '-') + '\n' + o('.bookintro').replace(/.*(观看小说|简介)[:：]|各位书友.*/g, '').replace(/\s+/g, '\n'),
	cover: og('image'),
	url: og('novel:read_url'),
};
book;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍后访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
$=JSON.parse(result);
list=[];
if($.Success){
vol=$.Volumes;
for(i in vol){
   //卷
     list.push({
            Chapter_name:'📖 '+vol[i].Volume_name+' 📖',
            Chapter_id  :vol[i].Volume_id
           })
   //章节
     for(j in vol[i].Chapters){
           c=vol[i].Chapters[j];
          list.push({
             Chapter_name:c.Chapter_name,
            Chapter_id:c.Chapter_id
          })
      }
}
}else{l=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(java.get('url'))).select('.chapter').toArray();
for(i in l){
list.push({Chapter_name:String(l[i].text()),Chapter_id:String(l[i].select('a').attr('href')).match(/\d+\/(.*?)\.html$/)[1]})
}list.push({Chapter_name:'登录后查看完整卷/章节列表'})
}
result=JSON.stringify(list)
</js>
$.[*]

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.java.util 
);
with(javaImport){
    let IV_PARAMETER = String("1ae2c94b");
    let ALGORITHM = "DES"; 
    let CIPHER_ALGORITHM = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
    let CHARSET = "utf-8";
    let password=String("KK!%G3JdCHJxpAF3%Vg9pN");


function decode(data){
let dks = new DESKeySpec(String(password).getBytes());
let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
let secretKey = keyFactory.generateSecret(dks);
let cipher = Cipher.getInstance(CIPHER_ALGORITHM);
let iv = new IvParameterSpec(IV_PARAMETER.getBytes(CHARSET));
cipher.init(Cipher.DECRYPT_MODE, secretKey, iv);
return new String(cipher.doFinal(Base64.getDecoder().decode(String(data).getBytes(CHARSET))), CHARSET);

}
}
//DES解密结束


content=java.getString("$.content",false);
saybody=java.getString("$.sayBody",false);
say=saybody!=""?"\n◎作者有话说：\n"+saybody:"";
if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){

result=String(decode(content)+say);
}else{result=content+say}


//获取评论开启
if(!baseUrl.match(/baidu/)){
//匹配书籍id跟章节id
bid=baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1];
cid=baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1];

//拼接评论url
url="https://s8-static.jjwxc.net/comment_json.php?novelid="+bid+"&chapterid="+cid;

//获取评论列表
list=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).body;

comment="";

//判断评论数量
len=list.length>15?15:list.length;

for(i=0;i<len;i++){
comment+=list[i].commentbody+"\n"
}

//判断是否有评论
comment=""?"":"\n◎最新评论：\n"+comment+"\n-完-";

//正文拼接评论
result=result+comment
}else{result=result}
</js>
